summary: In Paris, the emotional and professional tribulations of a musician and his roommate.
cast: Emmanuel Mouret|Frédérique Bel|Fanny Valette|Dany Brillant|Ariane Ascaride|Claire Breniaux|Clément Delmas|Magali Leroy|Jérôme Flaum|Frédéric Niedermayer|Hans Joachim Kruse
title: Changement d'adresse
